### Internal Audit Services & Information Technology and System Audit Services

#### Solicitation Number: 100024006
#### Solicitation Date: October 13, 2023
#### Closing Date: November 3, 2023 2:00 PM EST

**Business Description:**
The Department of Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) is seeking qualified professionals to provide Internal Audit Services and Information Technology and System Audit Services. The successful contractor will be responsible for providing assurance services related to internal audit and information technology and system audit services in support of the Department’s Internal Audit and Enterprise Risk Management Branch.

#### Key Requirements:

* Provide Internal Audit Services which include assurance services related to internal audit
* Provide Information Technology and System Audit Services which include assurance services related to information technology and system audit
* Meet the Supply Arrangement Holder under E60ZQ-180001 who qualified under Tier 1 for Internal Audit Services and Information Technology and System Audit

**Supply Arrangement:**
The proposed contract is valued at [insert contract value, if applicable] and is open to qualified contractors who hold a Supply Arrangement under E60ZQ-180001 and have been qualified under Tier 1 for the following streams:
* Stream 1 - Internal Audit Services
* Stream 3 – Information Technology and Systems Audit

**Contract Period:**
The proposed contract period is from April 1, 2024, with a term of two (2) years plus two (2) option periods of one (1) year each.

#### Further Information:
For further information, please contact:

* Karine Chamberland
* E-mail:NC-SOLICITATIONS-GD@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca
* Phone: (insert phone number)
* Contact Information Attached
